Plot: A blade runner must pursue and try to terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.
Title: Blade Runner
Writer: Hampton Fancher (screenplay), David Webb Peoples (screenplay), Philip K. Dick (novel)
Actors: Harrison Ford, Rutger Hauer, Sean Young, Edward James Olmos
tomatoConsensus: Misunderstood when it first hit theaters, the influence of Ridley Scott's mysterious, neo-noir Blade Runner has deepened with time. A visually remarkable, achingly human sci-fi masterpiece.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 11 wins & 16 nominations.
